item.title: KaTeX Example
item.description:
KaTeX Example Post

This post demonstrates how to write mathematical expressions using KaTeX in Hugo.

Inline Math

This is an inline equation: ( E = mc^2 )

Display Math

This is a block equation:

$$ \int_0^1 x^2,dx = \frac{1}{3} $$

Matrices

Here is how to render a matrix using KaTeX:

$$ \begin{bmatrix} a & b \ c & d \end{bmatrix} $$
